testsuite.system-out:
Feature: As a User I want to create a class about a certain subject So that I can distribute my knowledge
--Output from User can create a class-- Scenario: User can create a class # UserWantsToTeach.feature:7 Given I am at home page When I click on "new group" Then the app should redirect to the group config view And I should become Admin in this group
--Output from Admin configures the class-- #Trivial? Scenario: Admin configures the class # UserWantsToTeach.feature:14 Given User is at the Group config view When User sets the subject "New Technologies Class" Then a message should show similar classes like "New Technologies"
--Output from I want to add my friend as Super User-- Scenario: I want to add my friend as Super User # UserWantsToTeach.feature:19 Given I'm at group config view When I click on "Invite" Then A window should appear with SuperUser and Member fields And should be able to manage new users in each field.
--Output from I want to block unexperienced users from joining-- Scenario: I want to block unexperienced users from joining # UserWantsToTeach.feature:25 Given I'm at group config view When I click on "Correlatives" Then I should see all groups And be able to search by name and description
--Output from I want lots of contributions in my group and its projects-- #Trivial? Scenario: I want lots of contributions in my group and its projects # UserWantsToTeach.feature:32 Given I'm at group config view When I clock on "Privacy" Then I should be able to select "Private group"
--Output from I want some privacy in my group and its projects-- #Trivial? Scenario: I want some privacy in my group and its projects # UserWantsToTeach.feature:38 Given I'm at group config view When I clock on "Privacy" Then I should be able to select "public group"
--Output from User uploads the group-- Scenario: User uploads the group # UserWantsToTeach.feature:44 Given User has already configured the group When User clicks the 'create group' button Then the app should redirect to the new group view And I should be enbabled to accept calls members
testsuite.system-err: --Output from User can create a class-- --Output from Admin configures the class-- --Output from I want to add my friend as Super User-- --Output from I want to block unexperienced users from joining-- --Output from I want lots of contributions in my group and its projects-- --Output from I want some privacy in my group and its projects-- --Output from User uploads the group--
